members.signatureBeforeChange: boolean sendKeyEvent (int type, int msg, int wParam, int lParam, Event event)
members.signatureAfterChange: boolean sendKeyEvent (int type, int msg, int wParam, int lParam, Event event)
diff: -	* If the left button is down, the text widget refuses the character.
+	* Feature in Windows.  If the left button is down in
+	* the text widget, it refuses the character.  The fix
+	* is to detect this case and avoid sending a verify
